title: The meaning of sleeping in a coffin in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of sleeping in a coffin in a dream. The interpretation of the meaning of sleeping in a coffin in a dream depends on the condition of the fortuneteller, as it differs from one person to another, so through our article we will learn about the many interpretations of seeing a coffin in a dream. Interpretation of the meaning of sleeping in a coffin in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Whoever dreams of sleeping in a coffin in a dream Whoever carries it is evidence that he will occupy a high position in the coming period. A married woman who dreams of sleeping in a coffin and being carried by many is a sign of her high and great status among people. Also, seeing an unmarried woman in a coffin indicates her sophistication and high status. Seeing Ibn Sirin’s black coffin Dreaming of a black coffin is evidence that a person has committed many sins and needs to surrender and repent. It may indicate the high status of this person and assuming a great position. Seeing the presence of a coffin in a certain part of the house is a sign that the person in the house has committed some sins. It is also A sign of seeing a coffin in the house is that there is concern for the members of the house. If you dream of a coffin in the house, this indicates that the dreamer is committing serious and great sins. Dreaming of a dead person carrying the coffin of a living person is a sign of his love for that person. Seeing the coffin indicates a feeling of injustice and oppression. A pregnant woman who dreams that she is in a coffin is a sign of an easy and easy birth. Seeing a wooden coffin in a dreamDreaming of a golden coffin is a sign of the dreamer’s kindness. A wooden coffin is a sign of promotion and high status that he achieves at work. A pregnant woman who sees a wooden coffin is a sign that she She will give birth to a son. The silver casket is a sign of piety and firmness of faith. Dreaming of an empty coffinDreaming of an empty coffin indicates the death of the dreamer. Seeing the coffin falling in a dream is a sign that the person will lose money or business. The falling of the empty casket indicates the loss of the dream’s status among people. Dreaming of a coffin Made of diamonds is a sign that the dreamer is committing many sins. Seeing a flying coffin in a dream Seeing a flying coffin in a dream indicates that the dreamer will die soon. A married woman who sees a flying coffin in a dream is a sign of the death of a high-ranking person. For a pregnant woman who dreams With a flying coffin, she will die soon. As for an unmarried woman who sees a bird’s coffin in a dream, this indicates the death of a virtuous person. Interpretation of seeing a coffin in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees herself in a dream being carried in a coffin indicates that she will get married soon. An unmarried woman A married woman dreams of her coffin flying in the air, which indicates the death of a person in exile or the death of a person of great status. When an unmarried woman dreams of seeing a coffin, this means that she will marry a man of high status. An unmarried woman who dreams of a golden coffin indicates her marriage to someone She loves him. Seeing a married woman’s coffin in a dream. A married woman’s dream of a coffin is evidence of the corruption of her religion. And seeing coffins in one place for a married woman is evidence that the owners of that place are committing many sins and transgressions. The coffin is a solution.

title: Interpretation of seeing networks in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing handkerchiefs: Ibn Sirin says that seeing handkerchiefs in a dream means that the dreamer will make a lot of profits from his trade. If the dreamer sees dirty handkerchiefs in a dream, this dream shows the dreamer’s bad luck in life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing clean handkerchiefs in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will get married soon. From a good girl who is loved by everyone, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees scented tissues in her dream, she will achieve all the goals that she was trying to achieve. Interpretation of a dream about paper in a dream If one sees in his sleep, white tissues, this dream indicates the coming of kindness, abundance of sustenance, and abundance Money. If you see black tissue in a dream, this vision means that the dreamer will be exposed to a major financial crisis. Seeing cloth tissues in a dream indicates that he will hear good news in the coming period, and God is Most High. Seeing him sleeping tissues in a dream shows the positive changes that will occur in his life in the coming period, with permission. God. Interpretation of a dream about a beautiful French baguette in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees a baguette of fiancée in her dream, this dream indicates the coming of kindness, abundant living, and abundant money for her. A woman seeing thin paper towels in a dream can indicate the happiness that this girl will enjoy, God willing. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing beautiful scarves in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will soon become engaged to a good young man. If an engaged girl sees a fen picket in her dream, this vision is auspicious and indicates her imminent marriage by God’s command. Interpretation of seeing a handkerchief given in a dream to a married woman. Seeing handkerchiefs in a dream A married woman symbolizes virtuous morals and a good reputation among people. But if she sees herself giving a handkerchief to someone, then this dream shows the generosity, prestige, and power that she enjoys. They symbolize watching Give me the handkerchief. In the dream, she is a good wife whose husband respects and values ​​her a lot, and God knows best. If a woman sees A married woman in her dream is that she gives someone a handkerchief, then this vision is praiseworthy, and indicates the arrival of kindness and food. Interpretation of seeing handkerchiefs in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees tissues in a dream, then this dream indicates an easy and natural birth, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. But if she sees That she saw in her dream scented handkerchiefs, this vision indicates that she will give birth to a healthy child, God willing. Seeing white handkerchiefs in her dream indicates that her date of birth is approaching and that she will have good offspring by God’s command. Handkerchiefs in a pregnancy dream indicate marital happiness, family stability, success and excellence in her life. Interpretation of a vision giving a dead person a white handkerchief. If the dreamer sees him giving the deceased a white handkerchief in a dream, this vision symbolizes a change in the dreamer’s circumstances for the better. But if he sees the deceased giving him a white handkerchief in a dream, this dream means that he will hear happy news. Seeing the deceased giving him a handkerchief indicates White in the dreamer’s dream indicates fears and sorrows that may soon befall the dreamer. Ibn Sirin suggested that the vision gives

title: Interpretation of wearing a black dress in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the interpretation of wearing a black dress in a dream for a single woman, because the black color in our reality is a symbol of sadness, solace, and situations of loss and death. Rather, does the black color in a dream carry the same color that carries the same color in our reality. Therefore, during our article today, we will shed light On the meaning of the color black in a dream in general, then we will see the interpretation of seeing a black dress in a dream for single women of different heights and shapes through the opinions of translators such as Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi in detail through an encyclopedia, so follow us. Wearing a black dress in a dream for a single woman The symbol of the black dress in a dream of a son Ibn Sirin believes that the color black in a dream in general is a sign of sorrows, worries and problems, especially if the dreamer does not wear this color black in his reality, and God knows best. But if the dreamer is accustomed to wearing black in his reality, then this is good news about the imminent fulfillment of a desire or desire. A long-awaited dream, but it will come true with great difficulty, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. A black dress in a dream for a single woman. The majority of jurists and commentators have agreed that an unmarried person’s vision of a black dress in a dream varies in its interpretation according to the reason why a girl is wearing it in her dream, and we explain this as follows: If a girl wears it An unmarried or unmarried woman wearing a black dress at a party, this is a sign that she will hear news that will cause her great sadness and harm, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As for the dreamer who sees herself wearing a black dress but became beautiful after wearing it, this indicates her self-confidence and pride in herself and him. A clear indication that the vision has a strong personality, and God knows best. While if the girl is wearing a black dress in her dream to attend an honor, this dream indicates that the dreamer will receive a major promotion in her job and gain prestige, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. A short black dress in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried girl A married woman wearing a black but short dress is considered an unpleasant vision, because this is an indication that this girl does not have good morals and that she suffers from a lack of faith and does not perform her duties as she should. And God does not give His right in various acts of worship and worship.. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a long black dress for a single woman: If a girl who has never been married before sees herself in a dream wearing a beautiful long black dress and is satisfied with it, then this is a sign of success in her academic and professional life and that she will have a job. An excellent leadership position while waiting for it, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The long black dress is an indication of the stability of the family and family, and an indication of the concealment and good morals that the fortuneteller has, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a black wedding dress for a single woman. Interpretation scholars believe that when a girl sees herself in In a dream, she is wearing a wedding dress, but it is black. This is a sign of the worries and problems that befall her and that she is in great distress, God forbid. The black wedding dress is an indication that the girl has been forced to marry and is not satisfied, but rather rejects the man and does not prefer to approach her.

title: Interpretation of a dream about long and silky hair

preview.html: Through our topic today from gptafser.com/, we will explain the vision clearly. Interpretation of seeing long, silky hair in a dream for a single girl. When a single girl sees that she has long and smooth hair. It indicates that she will marry a person of good morals, and that she enjoys a condition that is not tight. Making the braid in Her dream is not praiseworthy, indicating that she will fall upon herself and suffer from it. While cutting hair in a dream for an unmarried woman, it is a sign of the changes that she will see in her life. Seeing red hair symbolizes obtaining high grades in academic life. Perhaps I will see red hair A sign of marrying a man with whom you will be happy, God willing. Fine hair has become curly in a dream. A sign of the presence of those who have hatred and envy, and they must be well protected. An unmarried woman’s fine hair falling out indicates paying off the debts she has accumulated. She will also get rid of Of the consequences in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about long hair. Interpretation of seeing long, silky hair in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream and seeing long hair in her dream. It indicates that he will attain goodness and sustenance, God willing. Soft black hair. A good sign that he has With stability in married life and that he enjoys happiness. The appearance of long hair is wonderful and soft for a married woman. It indicates that her husband will bring him the opportunity to travel abroad for a period that only God knows. Cutting hair in a dream is a sign for a married woman that she is not good. It indicates separation due to problems. Dyeing your hair and appearing happy in a dream indicates non-negative changes, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing long, silky hair in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing long hair for a man in a dream is considered a sign that he enjoys a life full of happiness with his family and wife. Seeing long hair in a dream for a man. It symbolizes the prestigious position he will reach in the field of work. He will obtain the things he wants to obtain. The appearance of the hair in a man’s dream as if it were thick indicates the large amount of money that will arrive. The appearance of the wife’s hair in the dream as if it were smooth. This indicates the presence of trends that will appear. With her, he must be wise and logical in resolving disputes. Hair loss in a dream is something worthy of praise, because it symbolizes the repayment of outstanding debts. Read also: Wet hair in a dream for a single woman The meaning of seeing long and silky hair in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation Smooth hair in a dream is considered a woman She is pregnant. It is only a good sign that she will undergo an easy birth, God willing. Soft hair in a dream indicates that she and her fetus are in good health with what is inside her womb. A pregnant woman who sees red hair in a dream indicates the health of the newborn, God willing. When she sees tangled hair In a dream, a pregnant woman cuts it, and it was also smooth. It indicates the obstacles that will appear to her during childbirth, which she will suffer from, and God knows best. Make a hairstyle using a comb. It says that her husband does not have any feelings of love. And always...

title: Read Ibn Sirin’s complete interpretations of seeing the bride in a dream

preview.html: The bride in a dream: Seeing the bride in a dream indicates many meanings that may carry good news of happiness, and her vision may express life’s problems and pains according to the details of the vision, through the statements of interpreters and scholars. What is the interpretation of the bride in a dream? Seeing the bride in a dream has more than one meaning and interpretation, It varies depending on the dreamer’s circumstances and the events he has recently experienced. If an unmarried girl sees that she is going to her friend’s wedding and sees her as a very beautiful bride, this is good news for her personally that she will marry the young man she loves and wants to be associated with. However, if the aspirations of the dreamer It is studying and acquiring knowledge, so she will excel in her studies and reach a high academic position, provided that the bride is beautiful. Seeing her in an inappropriate appearance and her white dress is dirty, and the dreamer does not recognize her, is a bad sign that the dreamer has many faults and must atone for them and Do some good deeds so as not to be exposed. For his anger, may God bless her. Seeing the bride without the presence of the groom next to her shows the loneliness that the fortuneteller feels. He may suffer from some worries, but he does not dare to reveal them to those around him. As for Imam Al-Nabulsi, he said that wedding ceremonies represent problems and obstacles in the way of those who want to achieve their ambitions and make them have to make great efforts. More efforts to overcome it. If the bride is dancing and swaying, this is a sign of the priest’s bad character and characteristics, which he must modify to make people repel her and spread around him. If the dreamer sees herself as a bride wearing a white dress, but she is alone in a crowd of people, this may represent Revealing some of her secrets, which puts her in an embarrassing position among her family. The bride in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of this dream differed as to whether the dreamer was single or married, or the dreamer was a man and saw a girl he knew or did not know wearing a wedding dress. If the girl saw that she A bride and everyone around her is happy and there are no sounds of music. This is good news that her worries will go away and she will emerge from her bad psychological state, and that happiness awaits her. She is with her future husband, whom he chooses on the basis of religion and morals. As for the married woman who once again finds herself sitting on a seat next to her current husband, she is stable in the family, loves her husband very much and does everything in her power to make him happy. Some commentators also said that if the pregnant woman She is wearing a white wedding dress, then her due date is already approaching and she will give birth easily and conveniently and her baby will be healthy and in good health. In general, the dream is good news, provided that there are no musical instruments or dancing. As for the presence of musical instruments in the dream, it expresses the misfortunes that await the dreamer and that require... Patience and perseverance to be able to do this. To confront and overcome it. What is the interpretation of seeing a bride in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a bride in a dream for a single woman If the bride is a fortune teller herself and seems happy in her dream, and there is a person next to her whom she loves in reality, then she will marry this person who will overcome all the obstacles that prevent her from marrying him.

Seeing a bride in a dream for a single woman If the bride is a fortune teller herself and looks happy in her dream, and there is someone next to her whom she loves in reality, then she will marry this person who overcomes all the obstacles that prevent her from marrying him

title: Dream interpretation of pregnancy for a single woman and miscarriage (Interpretation of miscarriage in a dream for single, pregnant and divorced women)

preview.html: The encyclopedia provides an interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a single woman and miscarriage, which is considered one of the difficult periods in a woman’s life during which she lives suffering from pregnancy pain and the weight of the fetus. An unmarried woman can see during her sleep that she is in the stage of pregnancy, whether she is happy or tired and sad. You can also see that he is in a state of miscarriage when he sees blood or does not see it, and each of these visions has different meanings according to the events of the dream and the psychological state of the dreamer. Learn about and below is an explanation of the dream of pregnancy for an unmarried woman and miscarriage according to what was reported by dream interpretation scholars. Feeling the pain of a miscarriage in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates failure to achieve what she seeks and wants. The appearance of a miscarriage indicates in A dream indicates feelings of sadness, despair, and the loss of something dear to her heart. Accompanying blood with a miscarriage in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes her deviation from the path of truth and committing disobedience and sins. The landing of a fetus in the hand of an unmarried woman in a dream indicates the collapse of worries and freedom from problems, and it also promises good news. Engagement and marriage to a good man. Seeing a pregnancy with twins in a dream for an unmarried woman shows the height of sadness and despair, and on the contrary, the interpretation is an indication that seeing a miscarriage in twins means a complete change in the dreamer’s situation in psychological and social terms. Progress, achieving a prominent position, and seeing the fetus after its miscarriage may indicate a happy marriage soon. Interpretation of a dream about miscarriage and the appearance of blood. The vision of buying bread also represents kindness and money, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of hunting deer in a dream by seeing a deer according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a deer in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man, or an unmarried young man, whether he is hunting a deer and eating the meat of a dead, slaughtered deer. And Ibn Sirin: Seeing a deer in a dream is one of the dreams that mainly indicates improving conditions and good things, but if one sees a deer in a dream running away from the dreamer, this is a sign that the dreamer will lose many good opportunities. Therefore, the interpretation of the dream varies depending on the details of the dream itself. Interpretation of the deer in a dream: The deer in a dream is one of the sailor’s wives or children. Whoever hunts a deer, gives it to him, or buys it, will have a livelihood, or marry a single man, or have a child. Whoever dreams: that he took a deer in a dream. He has inherited a lot of goodness, so if he slaughters a deer, he marries a slave girl. If he sees a deer jumping on him in a dream, then his wife disobeys him, and whoever has a deer, has legitimate money, or marries a respectable, free woman. Seeing a deer in a dream means women or children of beauty and kindness. A deer in a dream indicates marriage if he is single, or indicates the birth of a boy if he is married. Whoever sees in his dream that he takes a deer, this indicates his abundant wealth. Whoever sees in his dream that he slaughters a deer, this indicates his marriage. Whoever sees in his dream that he has a deer, this indicates that he will acquire lawful money. Or he will marry a generous woman from among the silks. When the dreamer sees a deer trying to escape from him in a dream, this is a sign of his failure to take advantage of the important and positive opportunities available to him in reality. The deer that is chasing the dreamer symbolizes achieving remarkable success in his life on various levels. When he has... The dreamer sees a deer in his dream, it portends abundant material gains and sustenance. If an unmarried woman hunts a deer in her dream and succeeds in catching it, this is a sign of her close relationship with the person she loves in reality. For a married woman, seeing a deer in her dream means that her family And her financial circumstances have improved significantly. If a pregnant woman sees a deer running away from her in her dream, this indicates her extreme anxiety and fear for the child’s mother. Whoever dreams of seeing a deer in a dream, and the deer is trying to escape from the dreamer, this dream was a sign that the dreamer cannot Taking advantage of opportunities and constantly missing them. Whoever sees himself in a dream killing a deer, this dream is an indication that the dreamer will interrupt someone close to him, who may be a friend or a lover. Whoever dreams of catching a deer is interpreted as a beautiful slave. Whoever dreams: That he killed a deer will make the woman sad. And whoever sees that he grabbed a deer’s socks, this indicates that a beautiful boy was obtained by a slave girl, and it is said that the deer was a beautiful Arab slave. If he sees that he threw a stone at a deer, then his vision indicates that he divorced his wife or had intercourse with a slave. In short, the dream of a deer is interpreted in four ways. Ways: a woman, a maid, a child, and a woman. Interpretation of the doe in a dream: As for the doe in the dream, it is a beautiful Arab slave. Whoever sees that he is the king of the doe, he will deceive a slave, and if he throws a stone at it, he will trample it. And whoever dreams: that he takes an antelope, then it is a boy, and if the antelope enters

title: Interpretation of blood in a girl’s dream in detail by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of blood for a single woman: Interpretation of blood in a dream for a girl. All people are curious to know the interpretation of the dreams that they dream of, to know their fate in the coming days, especially girls who want to know their future through what they see in their dreams. Therefore, today we will talk on the site about the interpretation of blood in a dream for a girl. Interpretation of blood in a dream for a girl or blood in a dream for an unmarried woman: Interpretation of blood in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence of many good things, the most important of which are the following: This dream may be evidence of this girl’s marriage in the near future, and God knows best. The old girl who sees Blood can indicate illness and death, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that blood is flowing from her vagina in a dream, this vision is good news and blessings from God, and that she will live a happy life with her husband without problems and hardships, and seeing Menstrual blood may indicate pregnancy. Imminent. Interpretation of a dream about blood on clothes in a dream: After talking about the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream for a married woman and talking about the interpretation of blood in a dream for a girl, we will talk about the interpretation of a dream about blood on clothes in a dream as follows: If you see blood on your clothes, this means that you You are haunted by memories of the past, for example, maybe in past actions you hurt someone, and a drop of blood indicates that the person will come back and want to take revenge on you. But if you are trying to clean the drop of blood from your clothes, it means that you are solving the mistakes you made in the past or just trying to show Yourself as if nothing had happened. If a girl dreams of blood stains on the wedding dress, this indicates your feeling of guilt or a personal problem that can spoil the joy. Interpretation of a dream of blood on the hand of an unmarried woman: Blood bleeding from the hand in a dream is evidence that the person took money A lot in reality, and God knows best, and the blood of the right hand is evidence that the person took money from his male relatives and the blood of his relatives. The left hand is evidence that the person has obtained money from his female relatives, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the legs in a dream: The blood that comes out of the man in a dream is one of the things that indicates different interpretations, the most important of which are the following: Blood coming out of the feet A man in a dream indicates that a person will go to war, and God knows best. A woman who saw blood flowing from her legs in a dream was a sign of her great ability to conceive, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about blood for a single woman: Seeing blood in a dream is generally a dream that carries some meanings. Not new ones, such as: Seeing blood in a dream is evidence of sins and that the dreamer is committing bad deeds, and God knows best. Blood in a dream could indicate illicit money, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And seeing the dreamer with blood coming from his body is evidence of his loss of money, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of the vision Blood in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried woman may see blood, or the interpretation of blood for a girl in a dream, is that blood is bleeding from her, whether it is menstrual blood or other blood for the woman. This dream indicates

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about moving to another house?

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of moving to another house: It is known that happy and joyful dreams make the dreamer feel comfortable and optimistic, such as the dream of moving to a new house. There is no doubt that everyone begins their lives in a simple house until God Almighty honors them with something better than that. . Otherwise, we will learn this by following the different opinions of great commentators. What is the interpretation of a dream about moving to another house? The meaning of the dream changes depending on the shape of the house. Who among us does not want to move to a better and more spacious house, so we find that seeing the dream brings many positive changes, Wishes.Seeing it spacious and comfortable is evidence of the abundance in supply of the dreamer, and that he will find great wealth in this world, and here he must constantly remember his Lord, who blessed him with an abundance of goodness, because the Lord is grateful to him. It is more, as God Almighty says, “And when your Lord makes you sound, He will suffice for them.” The vision expresses earning a lot of money during these days, and this will make the dreamer get rid of his debts and buy all his needs without any deficiency. The vision may be an alertness to the necessity of following the righteous path that pleases God Almighty and leads to... To success and excellence in all aspects of life. If the house is light and full of happiness, this indicates that the wife is a virtuous and righteous woman who cares about her religion by origin and her husband. The dreamer has been exposed to a disease in his body in reality, and seeing this dream is evidence of complete recovery from this disease and the removal of All pain is from him. Among the undesirable signs in this dream: If the house is full of defects and impurity, then this leads to worries and sorrows coming to him and he must find a solution to them before they become a problem in his life. If it is cramped and the dreamer does not enjoy comfort in it, it leads to Overcoming the worries and obstacles that bother him, but he overcomes them in a short time thanks to the Lord of the Worlds. Interpretation of the dream of moving to another house by Ibn Sirin Our teacher Ibn Sirin explained to us that most of this vision leads to happy meanings, goodness and blessings in the dreamer’s life. It may be a sign of the satisfaction of an important desire for him, It is the upcoming pilgrimage to the House of God, or traveling to increase knowledge, or perhaps finding a suitable job that provides him with many advantages and a lot of money. If the dreamer commits a sin in his life, this is a sign of repentance from it and not returning to it, as he has discovered the path of guidance and righteousness and keeping away from sin. Wrong. The vision expresses the good upbringing of children, as the dreamer teaches them kindness and appropriate behavior that will put them in a great position in the life of this world and the afterlife. It also indicates the transition from a state of poverty and lack of money to an increase and a blessing that allows him to achieve what he wants and wants without resorting to anyone, no matter how close he is. His fear and anxiety about some things make the vision for him in the next few days and that he will not feel any harm or pain. Seeing a house built of iron has a clear indication of health and longevity for the pioneer, as he will not contract any disease that will disturb him or disturb his safety. A bright house is a sign of... Comfort, happiness and an obedient wife who brings bliss and stability to the visionary. As for E

Interpretation of the dream of moving to another house by Ibn Sirin Our teacher Ibn Sirin explained to us that most of this vision leads to happy meanings, goodness and blessings in the dreamer’s life. It may be a sign of the satisfaction of an important desire for him, It is the upcoming pilgrimage to the House of God, or traveling to increase knowledge, or perhaps finding a suitable job that provides him with many advantages and a lot of money. If the dreamer commits a sin in his life, this is a sign of repentance from it and not returning to it, as he has discovered the path of guidance and righteousness and keeping away from sin. Wrong. The vision expresses the good upbringing of children, as the dreamer teaches them kindness and appropriate behavior that will put them in a great position in the life of this world and the afterlife. It also indicates the transition from a state of poverty and lack of money to an increase and a blessing that allows him to achieve what he wants and wants without resorting to anyone, no matter how close he is. His fear and anxiety about some things make the vision for him in the next few days and that he will not feel any harm or pain. Seeing a house built of iron has a clear indication of health and longevity for the pioneer, as he will not contract any disease that will disturb him or disturb his safety. A bright house is a sign of... Comfort, happiness and an obedient wife who brings bliss and stability to the visionary. As for E
